name: Dragon Ball Z Statue 1/4 Super Saiyan Vegeta 64 cm
description:
Prime 1 Studio is proud to present another collaboration with MegaHouse to bring you the long-awaited prince of the Saiyan Race, 1/4 Scale MPMDBZ-02 Super Saiyan Vegeta from Dragon Ball Z!!!

Vegeta is from Planet Vegeta, home of the elite warriors of the proud Saiyan race. He is the true eternal rival of Son Goku and only lives to become stronger and defeat his enemies. Regardless of whatever allies he may make on the way, Vegeta is a proud warrior that stays true to himself. Through the spirit of seeking power, dedicated training, and true determination, Vegeta is a Super Saiyan!

MegaHouse has collaborated with Prime 1 Studio's exquisite 3D modeling to bring to life one of the most iconic moments in DBZ history. We have captured Vegeta as he is charging his Big Bank Attack! Complete with LED illumination and swappable lightning and stone effects around the statue, this one-of-a-kind masterpiece will pop out in any collection. Pair with the MPMDBZ-02 Super Saiyan Goku to have the ultimate Saiyan display! A must have for DBZ fans everywhere!

Product Specifications:

- Statue Size approx. 25 inches tall with Big Bang Attack [H:64.7cm W:45.1cm D:39.6cm]
- Statue Size approx. without Big Bang Attack [H:64.7cm W:45.1cm D:48.7cm]
- LED Illumination effect on Base and Big Bang Attack
- One (1) Dragon Ball Z designed theme base
- One (1) Set of Special Effect Parts for Display around Base
- Two (2) Swappable effect parts (Lightning Effect, Stone Parts)
